name: Turtle Islands
description:
A 3 Lvl puzzle game for a game jam, only controls are left click, which makes the turtle travel to an island. Your goal is to transport people in as few steps as possible to the correct destinations. You can only transport one person at a time, to make the game a little harder.

*Spoiler*  The max islands to visit before losing for each lvl are 2,3 and 4. *Spoiler*

Art, game play and music made by me (sorry about the music, it is a placeholder in case I won't get better one before the jam ends.

Font is 

https://www.1001freefonts.com/rock-outline.font
